statements: SELECT show_title, genre FROM tv_show_genres WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT genre, COUNT(*) FROM tv_show_genres GROUP BY genre;
SELECT show_title FROM tv_show_genres WHERE genre = 'Drama' ORDER BY show_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM tv_show_genres WHERE show_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM tv_show_genres ORDER BY genre DESC;
SELECT show_id, show_title, genre FROM tv_show_genres WHERE genre = 'Comedy' ORDER BY show_title DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT show_title, genre FROM tv_show_genres WHERE show_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY genre ASC;
SELECT * FROM tv_show_genres WHERE genre LIKE '%Drama%' OR genre = 'Action' ORDER BY show_id ASC, show_title ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM tv_show_genres ORDER BY genre ASC;
SELECT show_id, show_title, genre FROM tv_show_genres WHERE show_id > 2 AND genre != 'Thriller' ORDER BY show_id DESC, genre ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, genre, rating FROM tv_shows WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tv_shows WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT id, name FROM tv_shows WHERE rating > 8.0;
SELECT genre_name FROM genres ORDER BY genre_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM tv_shows WHERE name LIKE 'Stranger%';
SELECT name, rating FROM tv_shows WHERE genre = 'Action' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM tv_shows WHERE genre = 'Comedy' AND rating >= 8;
SELECT name, genre_name FROM tv_shows JOIN genres ON tv_shows.genre = genres.genre_name;
SELECT * FROM tv_shows WHERE genre LIKE '%Drama%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, genre_name FROM tv_shows JOIN genres ON tv_shows.genre = genres.genre_name GROUP BY genre_name HAVING AVG(rating) > 7.5;
SELECT * FROM TVShows;
SELECT show_name, genre FROM TVShows WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT show_name, genre, release_date FROM TVShows ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT show_name, genre FROM TVShows WHERE genre = 'Drama';
SELECT show_name, genre, genre_name FROM TVShows JOIN ShowGenres ON TVShows.show_id = ShowGenres.show_id JOIN Genres ON ShowGenres.genre_id = Genres.genre_id;
SELECT * FROM TVShows;
SELECT show_name, genre FROM TVShows WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT show_name, genre, release_date FROM TVShows WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT show_name, genre_name FROM TVShows JOIN ShowGenres ON TVShows.show_id = ShowGenres.show_id JOIN Genres ON ShowGenres.genre_id = Genres.genre_id WHERE genre_name = 'Drama';
SELECT show_name, genre_name, release_date FROM TVShows JOIN ShowGenres ON TVShows.show_id = ShowGenres.show_id JOIN Genres ON ShowGenres.genre_id = Genres.genre_id WHERE release_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM ShowGenres;
SELECT show_name, genre FROM ShowGenres WHERE show_id = 1;
SELECT show_name, genre FROM ShowGenres WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT show_name, genre FROM ShowGenres ORDER BY show_name ASC;
SELECT show_name, genre FROM ShowGenres WHERE genre = 'Drama' ORDER BY show_name DESC;
SELECT show_name, genre FROM ShowGenres;
SELECT category_name FROM GenreCategories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT show_name, rating FROM ShowGenres INNER JOIN ShowRatings ON ShowGenres.show_id = ShowRatings.show_id;
SELECT show_name, genre FROM ShowGenres WHERE genre = 'Comedy' ORDER BY show_name ASC;

SELECT show_name, category_name FROM ShowGenres JOIN ShowCategoryMapping JOIN GenreCategories ON ShowGenres.show_id = ShowCategoryMapping.show_id AND ShowCategoryMapping.category_id = GenreCategories.category_id;
SELECT * FROM Genres;
SELECT genre_name FROM Genres ORDER BY genre_name DESC;
SELECT show_name, genre_name FROM Shows INNER JOIN Genres ON Shows.genre_id = Genres.genre_id;
SELECT episode_name AS 'Episode Name', air_date AS 'Air Date' FROM Episodes WHERE air_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT actor_name, role_name FROM Actors INNER JOIN Roles ON Actors.actor_id = Roles.actor_id ORDER BY actor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Genres;
SELECT show_name, genre_name FROM Shows INNER JOIN Genres ON Shows.genre_id = Genres.genre_id;
SELECT episode_name, air_date FROM Episodes WHERE air_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT actor_name, role_name FROM Actors INNER JOIN Roles ON Actors.actor_id = Roles.actor_id;

SELECT show_name, episode_name, actor_name FROM Shows INNER JOIN Episodes ON Shows.show_id = Episodes.show_id INNER JOIN Roles ON Episodes.episode_id = Roles.episode_id INNER JOIN Actors ON Roles.actor_id = Actors.actor_id ORDER BY show_name ASC, episode_name DESC;
